qa.name: Mr. Snuggles
qa.appearance: Well-worn, patched-up teddy bear with button eyes

json_to_edit.voice_over: By day, a forgotten toy. By night, a hero of the imagination.
json_to_edit.description: Mr. Snuggles leads a double life as a forgotten toy and a secret adventurer.
json_to_edit.name: Mr. Snuggles' Secret Life
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A forgotten teddy bear comes to life at night for grand adventures.

qa.action: A cluttered child's bedroom bathed in moonlight, toys scattered about.

hf.action: Mr. Snuggles' button eyes suddenly blink to life.

tr.action: Mr. Snuggles carefully climbs down from the shelf he's been sitting on.

xc.action: Mr. Snuggles ties a makeshift cape around his neck, preparing for adventure.

ka.action: Mr. Snuggles unfurls a hand-drawn map of the 'kingdom' (actually the house).

fn.action: Mr. Snuggles hops into a toy car, ready to embark on his journey.

af.action: Mr. Snuggles 'drives' through a cardboard city he's built under the bed.

qo.action: Mr. Snuggles spots a 'dragon' (actually a house plant) blocking his path.

fp.action: Mr. Snuggles bravely faces off against the 'dragon', waving a pencil like a sword.

va.action: As dawn breaks, Mr. Snuggles hurries back to his shelf, resuming his 'forgotten toy' pose.

edit_command: Remove every second shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: By day, a forgotten toy. By night, a hero of the imagination.
updated_json.description: Mr. Snuggles leads a double life as a forgotten toy and a secret adventurer.
updated_json.name: Mr. Snuggles' Secret Life

label.rationale: we will remove every second shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements of the json intact. this means we'll remove shots with keys "hf", "xc", "fn", "qo", and "va". we'll update the "list_display_order" accordingly and adjust the "number_of_shots" from "10" to "5". all other information in the json, including the characters, voice over, description, location, and remaining shots, will remain unchanged.
